summary: on Christmas eve, The doctor travels into the past of a bitter old man who has the power to save Amy and Rory but doesn't want to save them, so that he doesn't grow up to be mean and bitter.
cast: Matt Smith|Karen Gillan|Arthur Darvill|Michael Gambon|Katherine Jenkins|Laurence Belcher|Danny Horn|Leo Bill|Pooky Quesnel|Micah Balfour|Steve North|Bailey Pepper|Tim Plester|Nick Malinowski|Laura Rogers|Meg Wynn Owen
keywords: christmas|eleventh doctor|shark attack|flying fish|reference to a christmas carol
title: A Christmas Carol
